thread.title: StockholmFreeTour.com Introduces Walking Tours for Enthusiastic Tourists
thread.title_full: StockholmFreeTour.com Introduces Walking Tours for Enthusiastic Tourists

author: prbuzz.com
title: StockholmFreeTour.com Introduces Walking Tours for Enthusiastic Tourists
text:
The same guides conduct both private and free tours for all travelers
02/09/2015, Stockholm, Sweden: Stockholm has a special place among European capitals because of incredible number of attractions. The travelers preferring walking tours will definitely appreciate a professional guide. Any guide will gladly share exciting information about the Swedish capital - from historical evidence to funny gossips. There are paid Stockholm tours available as well which require prior booking and have a fixed price.
Many people visit Stockholm for holidaying. Taking a local guide is a time-saving solution for many of those foreigners - they would like to have somebody who can explain everything and help them. The newer area processes as many dark secrets and amusing facts and stories as the medieval Stockholm. The free Stockholm tours arranged by http://www.stockholmfreetour.com/ do not require any prior reservation. There are just two simple obligatory steps here - applying for a free tour and getting to the gathering point timely. Depending on the area, there are two groups of free tours which are available for interested visitors.
The free tours are conducted in English language for the convenience of people coming from different parts of the world. We also organize combined tours around Stockholm - please, contact us with this issue via the contact information published below. The only requirement for a tour is presence of not fewer than 2 guests.
The website claims, We are doing everything to help all tourists feel comfortable in Stockholm. Walking tours are perfectly suitable for this city because it needs to be perused leisurely. Everyone can be absolutely sure in skills and experience of our guides. A guide will help you quickly find new sites and learn new things. Since there is no reservation needed, it is convenient and popular solution.
To get more details concerning the services, please check http://www.stockholmfreetour.com/
Website information
The website states that the guides in the free Stockholm tours do their job for tips received from the visitors. There is no fixed amount and they can give an amount they wish, regarding their individual experience. Additionally to the tours, our website offers a number of useful tips travel guides and ëthings to doí list whilst visiting Stockholm.
